articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: R-Girls Website - Tutorial
articles.contents:

          About

              R-Girls Website - Tutorial
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                         Twitter
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                         GitHub
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            Welcome!
            We are delighted to announce that we are setting up a
            worldwide network to promote the use of R - a leading data
            science programming language - in secondary schools for
            girls.
            This site is aimed primarily at teachers who want to use
            R in their lessons. On this website, you can find details
            on:
            Getting Started
            Ready made Math, Science and Geography lessons.
            Or, join us for a friendly chat on Slack
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              R-Girls Website - Tutorial
